addons.name: For Better Club (FBC)
addons.description: Smarter, extensible facial animation and posing engine, instant messaging, appearance layering and a collection of quality of life improvements.
addons.author: the authors of the Addon Manager

addons.name: Universal Remote
addons.description: This remote works across chat rooms, but requires both players to have it. /ur or friends list to use.
addons.author: the authors of the Addon Manager

addons.name: Bondage Club Extended (BCX)
addons.description: Adds rules, curses, and more to enhance D/s play alongside a handful of quality of life improvements
addons.author: Jomshir98 & Claudia

addons.name: Themed
addons.description: Adds custom themes to BC along with other features
addons.author: dDeepLb

addons.name: BCX Reset Button Disabler
addons.description: A very simple addon that disables the Module and Reset Buttons from BCX. That means you can have a new layer of helplessness.
addons.author: Ciber

addons.name: Bondage Club Auto React (BCAR)
addons.description: Automatically reacts to messages in the Bondage Club
addons.author: Dr Branestawm

addons.name: Bondage Club X-Toys Integration
addons.description: Sync club interactions and toys with IRL remote-controlled toys, recommended use with https://github.com/itsFro/BCBridge
addons.author: ItsNorin

addons.name: BCTweaks
addons.description: Split arousal and orgasm bars, tail wagging, and Best Friends
addons.author: Crimsonfox & agicitag

addons.name: Eli's Bondage Club Helper (EBCH)
addons.description: Ungarble, custom notifications, altering other player's poses
addons.author: Elicia

addons.name: Little Sera's Club Games (LSCG)
addons.description: Adds large gamified systems for hypnotism and breathplay
addons.author: Little Sera

addons.name: Mute's Bondage Club Hacks Collection (MBCHC)
addons.description: Autohack, local time, some keyboard goodies etc.
addons.author: Mute

addons.name: Maid's Bondage Scripts (MBS)
addons.description: Additional crafting slots, additional options in wheel of fortune, and custom outfits in wheel of fortune
addons.author: Rama

addons.name: Responsive
addons.description: Automatically sends messages when the user reaches a certain state (slapped, orgasm, etc).
addons.author: SaotomeToyStore, dDeepLb

addons.name: ULTRAbc
addons.description: A large collection of cheats, quality of life improvements, and a moaner script

addons.name: NotifyPlus
addons.description: Improve the Name Mentioned notification in the original BC. Use keywords for mentioning names according to different roles. (Note: source code unavailable)
addons.author: SaotomeToyStore

addons.name: TTS and Morse
addons.description: Text-to-speech reading for chat messages, and some buttplug.io + morse functionalities.
addons.author: KatKammand

addons.name: Chat Auto Translator Script
addons.description: Addon that auto-translates the chat to the language you want. 130+ Languages available. Commands: /ttoggle to toggle the translator on and off. And /tlang <lang_code>, to change the language used.
addons.author: Ciber, dDeepLb and KatKammand
